textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 05/01/2012 Authorities in Ohio have arrested five men in connection with a plot to blow up a bridge outside of Cleveland. 5 Arrested In Connection With Cleveland Bomb Plot 04/11/2015 Businesses were boarding up and cleaning up Saturday after a night of vandalism led to dozens of smashed windows along Shadyside’s upscale shopping district. Stores Begin Cleanup Process After Vandals Go On Spree In Shadyside 04/12/2015 The mother of a man whose passing was supposed to be marked by a memorial march in Pittsburgh said her son was done no honor by the masked group who rampaged through an upscale neighborhood breaking windows. Mother: Son’s Memory Not Honored By Memorial March Vandalism
